## correlation() function

Calculates the correlation matrix of a matrix `A`

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function correlation<S>(A: Matrix<S>): Matrix<S>;
```

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  A | <code>Matrix&lt;S&gt;</code> | The matrix |
